name:
Toggle
Mac
title: Toggle true apple mode with switching base layer 0(mac) or 1

name:
Mac
ON
title: Enable true apple mode with switching base layer 0

name:
Mac
OFF
title: Enable true apple mode with switching base layer 1

name:
Apple
fn+FK
title: Apple Fn/Globe key for the keyboard that dosen't have F1-12 keys. F1-12 keys can be mapped on top row. When mac mode is off, It simulates mac fn functions.

name:
EJ
TOGG
title: Toggle send かな and 英数

name:
USJ
TOGG
title: Toggle enabling key overridng for ANSI layout on JIS environment

name:
USJ
ON
title: Enable key overriding for ANSI layout on JIS environment

name:
USJ
OFF
title: Disable key overriding for ANSI layout on JIS environment

name:
RC
Button
title: The button located on radial controller

name:
RC
Left
title: Counter clockwise rotation of the radial controller. While pressing shift key, the rotation speed becomes slow 1/4 fine mode

name:
RC
Right
title: Clockwise rotation of the radial controller, While pressing shift key, the rotation speed becomes slow 1/4 fine mode
